amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike capital and debt service subsidies for Amtrak.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the paragraph providing funding for Capital and Debt Service Grants to the National Railroad Passenger Corporation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brooks (AL) amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 139 - 286 (Roll no. 304).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Brooks (AL) amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 139 - 286 (Roll no. 304).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Brooks (AL).
